article: I must tell you about the most terrible dream I had the other night. Actually, it wasn't a dream, it was _ of a nightmare. You know I don't believe in the super natural: ghosts, witchcraft and all _ , but what happened was so _ that I'm actually beginning to _ there must be some truth in it. It was a _ night, with the wind howling and the thunder crashing but finally I _ to get to sleep. What happened next was really _ . There, at the end of the bed, stood a dark figure. I'm not exaggerating ---- _ I could really see it. It was dark in the room, of course, but I saw the _ of the figure clearly. I know not all ghosts are _ , but this one looked really terrifying. Then it spoke. At _ , it made some sounds; it was moaning , as if in _ . You can imagine by this time I was trembling _ . Hiding under the blankets, I was _ from head to foot. What terrified me was the thought that the thing might _ me. I knew if it did, I would _ . It kept on making strange sounds which now sounded more like _ or spells. Was it some kind of witch, sent to _ its magic on me, I wondered. Then it _ into the wall. How I fell asleep again is still a _ to me. What do you make of it all? You know I was never superstitious but now I'm not sure.
